lead_paragraph: Fourteen others were injured when the chartered bus, which was carrying members of a North Carolina church congregation, crashed along Interstate 40.
snippet: Fourteen others were injured when the chartered bus, which was carrying members of a North Carolina church congregation, crashed along Interstate 40....
abstract: Tennessee authorities say at least eight people died after a front tire of a chartered bus blew out along Interstate 40, sending the vehicle across a grassy median and into a tractor-trailer and a sport utility vehicle.

headline.main: Eight Are Killed in Tennessee After Tire Blows Out on Bus
headline.print_headline: Eight Killed in Tennessee After Tire Blows Out on Bus Chartered by Church Group
